nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic established a prison on the planet Brentaal IV. The criminals Lyshaa, Ryyk, and Sagoro Autem were placed in the facility prior to the Battle of Brentaal in 22 BBY. After the prison was captured by Separatist forces under warlord Shogar Tok, Jedi Master Quinlan Vos joined the prisoners' numbers.
